title: Can anyone post the whole portion for the JEE Mains and Advanced with subtopics in each chapter? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am attaching the links for the syllabus of JEE Mains and Advance for the year 2020. If you're a 2021 aspirant then you may have to wait for some time for NTA to release the official syllabus. As there may be changes. Jee Mains-2020[1] Jee Advance 2020 Physics[2] Chemistry[3] Maths[4] All the Best👍 Footnotes[1] https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=https://jeemain.nta.nic.in/WebInfo/Handler/FileHandler.ashx%3Fi%3DFile%26ii%3D13%26iii%3DY&ved=2ahUKEwiCg_yZ1-XrAhW5H7cAHVRcBHYQFjADegQIAhAB&usg=AOvVaw2PLSbLlbLVW7fU8Q9fi9bZ[2] physics_syllabus.pdf[3] chemistry_syllabus.pdf[4] mathematics_syllabus.pdf
